cont.intro.other:
Code is available publicly on Github. Do you want to fix a bug, help others in the forum or push the next killer feature? Get involved!
                            Or show your love on social networks!

cont.subtitle.other: Pydio Cells is free open source software. Contribute back!

cont.topic.pr.other: I implemented a new feature: github Pull Requests

cont.topic.report.other: I think I found a bug! Post in the forum.

cont.topic.report.2.other: My bug is qualified: open a github issue.

cont.topic.translate.other: How-to create or complete a language translation ?

ent.advanced.legend.other: Unique admin dashboard for real-time monitoring of platform usage.

ent.features.legend.other: Enterprise-ready features : AD/LDAP Connectors, Auditable Logs for compliance, EasyTransfer...

ent.subtitle.other: MORE FEATURES - GDPR COMPLIANCE - EXTENDED BRANDING

ent.support.legend.other: Get help with your installation directly from the core team

welc.guide.other: If you don't know where to start, the Administrator Guide is definitely a good read!

welc.intro.other: This is your dashboard for managing Pydio. Using the left menu you can create workspaces and users, check all events that happened on the platform, and manage configurations and plugins.

welc.import.other: If you are currently running a Pydio 8 installation, please be aware that Pydio 8 will be considered End-Of-Life at the end of 2019. You can use the Import Tool to migrate all data to Pydio Cells.

welc.subtitle.other: The place to administrate and monitor the activity of your platform
